fields.name: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: Two mob hitmen, a boxer, a pair of diner bandits, and a pair of philosophical hitmen converge in a series of interconnected stories.

fields.name: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.name: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City, Batman must use all his skills to stop him and restore order.

fields.name: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

fields.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A hobbit, a wizard, a dwarf, and a human form an unlikely fellowship to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.
